translated_text: Restaurant to avoid. Completely industrial, the dish, dessert…. Bad wine and more expensive!  The server was nice. The Hotel is beautiful, beautiful swimming pool opposite the sea, but we did not stay in this hotel. Besides, in the restaurant there was only us. The room was empty! Damage!

Very good stay!
Clean and well located hotel, welcoming and professional staff. Comfortable room, varied and very good breakfast. Special mention to the restaurant staff, attentive and smiling. I recommend without hesitation!

I had a great time in this place. The welcome was very warm, the staff attentive and smiling. The place is clean, well organized, and we feel a real passion in service. Each detail is neat, and the atmosphere makes you feel comfortable. I highly recommend to those looking for a good experience, whether with family, friends or solo. A place where we want to come back!

Super hotel, the staff are very welcoming and smiling, the buffet and really top. I recommend with pleasure this fabulous hotel located a few steps from the sea. The setting is heavenly and very well maintained. The cleaning in the rooms is done every day, very good experience for my part.

It's a perfect hotel 
Everything is in Tooooooooop 
Toooop food 
Tooooop frame 
Tooooop room 😍😍😍X
Staff are always available for requests 
Especially that we were 70 people 💪🏻💪🏻👏🏻👏🏻 Thank you Bizerta Resort Congress and Spa

I am extremely disappointed with the reception staff.
I have repeatedly asked to change rooms and each time the same answer tomorrow but nothing happens. And in addition to that, more than limited kindness.
A hotel calling for 4 stars is rather like a hotel with 4 shooting stars.
To flee !!!

Perfect welcome, very caring kind staff. I appreciated the large hearty buffet, with European and Tunisian specialties. The whole group appreciated the work room with sea views and the possibility of being able to go out quickly to discuss or even work in small groups around the swimming pool or on the lawn. Very fast access to the beach from the hotel, which we have often taken advantage of.

Great Resort where we keep coming back due to the high service Quality: 

Food is great and the kitchen and service team are highly freindly, fast answering our requests and always provide our needs.
Wifi is covering most of the building and even near the swimming pool with high speed internet.
Two elevators are working perfectly and aways clean as well no malfunction , so perfect.
Rooms are tidy, clean with hot and cold water exist as well high pressure in all times of the day and night, Shampo and body gel is provided every day next to the towels. 

Parking place is free provided and security and safety is ensured day and night. 
Reception team are always available with one or two persons if not three at the same time. 
You can also change your currency with bit lower rate but still really fair. 
The indoor swimming pool have seperated showers, locker rooms and nice place to swimm with the family or collegues as well the small gym they provide. 

Great experiance and for sure to be recommended for future seminars.,

I spent a week of training at the Bizerta Resort hotel, we were a group of a 50 -participants, the hotel staff were very careful with us, the catering was varied and very correct, the rooms very clean and comfortable. Between beach and swimming pool, the setting is pleasant. I recommend this hotel for a training stay or a teamwitching, the spaces lend themselves well and I warmly thank all the kitchen, service and maintenance staff. The hotel is close to the city center, old port and shops.

Spacious and clean room. Friendly and professional staff. Pleasant space and diversified and good catering. I recommend Bizerta comes out for a professional and personal stay. Very pleasant setting with very suitable meeting spaces.

Amazing accommodation, great reception, a high quality rooms, a good level food. The accommodated all our needs for the full duration. 
The reception team always was at our highest expectations and they made checking in and out seamless and fun. I recommend

Very welcome for a group of around forty people: the attentive, available and professional team. The rooms are spacious and clean, the view is magnificent and everyone is very caring. At the restaurant a buffet with pretty dishes, with excellent fresh products, with a pleasant and fast service. Several functional and equipped work rooms and all this in a green setting, a stone's throw from the sea. And many more facilities: swimming pools, spa, cafe-bar, even the hairdresser!

The staff are really nice and attentive, good and balanced meals, clean and comfortable rooms. A very good experience to recommend ... which also impressed me is calm. Sleep the window open without problem. Thank you for this great week.

A very comfortable place, with excellent service. Throughout A
Our training, we were welcomed in a very warm way, brought this breast breaks, the cleaning of the rooms was excellent, all the staff is smiling, welcoming and in good humor. I recommend this place to have a good time by the sea and welcomed in a very warm way!

The hotel is very well equipped and very clean, thank you to the staff! 
We had a very good stay. The view is very beautiful.
The staff are very nice. We had a great time. 
The sea is very close and that is pleasant. We are happy with the stay

Very pleasant hotel and receiving personsts, hygiene Impeccable restoration very satisfactory The beach is accessible the rooms.de. spacious work Ilny also has the.piscine and the sport to allow you to do you have the experience to make a sauna of 50 minutes but I found that it is not hot enough it allows you to stay too much if not it would have been too much

A beautiful quiet hotel suitable for families 
The hotel crew, God willing, to them 
Eating is suitable and beautiful taste 
The rooms are clean and wide 
I advise everyone who wants to visit Bizerte because it is true 
 A place that can be said is wonderful
 Long as you shine
More brilliance and continuing to provide your wonderful services ...

It was a pleasant experience in addition the people of the hotel welcomed us very well I will give 5 stars thank you very much to Bizert and all the person I have met Tunisians from the Moroccan and even the French and the German.

Flawless !!!
Very warm welcome and top services (caring).
The icing on the cake = top kitchen
The pool is well heated.
The parking lot is secure.
Ideal for summer and winter.
The best of bizerte.
I recommend 100 %
Good trip 😃

Simply shameful. Room full of ants, yellow stained sheets, mold on the walls, dirt and hair everywhere. Terrace communicating with the terraces of the other rooms, pity, however, that I could not close the balcony and that anyone could have entered and steal everything. Escape !!!!

For asmathics like me, I do not recommend this hotel. It has the distinction of having carpets in the rooms and what is more systematically cleaned. Especially since the hotel does not have non -smoking rooms (all rooms have an ashtray) ... so may have cigarette odors in some of them. In addition, the service is not worthy of a 4*: glasses offered but no water bottle which is the minimum required. To succeed in sleeping, I had to put a t-shirt on the pillow so much that he was loaded with dust. I do not recommend this hotel for the dilapidation of the rooms. Otherwise the staff try to do the necessary with the few means made available. Expensive for what it is (110 €/night in September.

I often go to Bizerte for work, I have tested the hotel for the first time, it is splendid from the outside, it reminds me of a palace of Marrakech, the garden and the very well maintained swimming pool. I was with a room in the 4th century, in the 4th the rooms deserve a renovation and I took a renovated room in the 1st floor, they are perfect, Italian shower marble on the ground.
The staff are very nice in the welcome, a big thank you to Rim who knows his job well and who is always looking for a solution for customers. The morning breakfast must be Ameliore, the evening buffet and very correct.
I will come back with pleasure without this hotel .... and I recommend it is surely the best of bizerte, there is also the spa to relax in the evening after work.

Very bad time spent in the very poor quality infective food restaurant that animals are not even shame 
We even serve pasta at Salami Sky never seen 
I strongly advise against everyone not to go there

A horrible hotel with horrible non-existent services. I strongly advise you not to go there, to sleep and eat in any case!!! The staff is not friendly
Fast food is very very basic
Aside from the location, whether it is the welcome, the service or the quality/price ratio, everything needs to be reviewed...

Great hotel on the beach, and easy walking distance to medina. Staff excellent, and rooms of a  very good standard. Breakfast good, but no toasting machine or tea. Pool bar and restaurant very good but closes way too early around 5, which only leaves the bar for a drink, which is very dated, and the most uncomfortable chairs, I have ever experienced, although bar staff very friendly and helpful. Rooms cleaned to a high standard, and can recommend the sea view ones, excellent. Shoe shine machines on each floor, but non have any polish in them, just the Rotating brushes. Bathrooms to a high standard, but no plugs in the sink, so not ideal. Air conditioning not very cold. Overall a very good experience, and the beach is superb.

Hello, this hotel absolutely does not deserve 4 stars. Very old hotel. The cleanliness of the rooms leaves something to be desired. The bed linen has not been changed. Corpse of a bird in the terrace that has apparently dated for a long time. Our booking agency had to ring at the reception so that we can change rooms. Our opinion remained the same.  
With regard to reception staff, apart from listening to our complaints, no effort, no excuse or compensation from them. We were very disappointed. We will never advise this hotel. To flee!

Good and varied meals, the rest is good and the view is superb. Welcoming staff! The last day we had to leave earlier for the airport and they had the great kindness of opening the kitchen earlier to allow us to have lunch before leaving

Every day, we were entitled to an excellent buffet as much in the morning as in the evening, the staff was courteous and accommodating at all times, are the clean spaces, all with a superb view of the sea.
Very clean and very attentive personal hotel, beautiful personalized attentions has every day.  They are listening to our needs and sees what we lack for nothing.  Superb view of the ocean!

A nice week spent at this hotel, the people are kind.
I like the concept of buffet. 
Locate well on the seaside.
Superb view. near all service.
Perfect for business trips and holidays.

Reception and cleanliness of the irreproachable rooms. Staff at the service of customers, benevolence and guaranteed smile. I recommend this hotel for a business or relaxation stay. Looking forward to seeing yourself again soon.

Thank you for everything!  The room was large and clean with attention to the staff. Very good service too. The establishment has a view of the Mediterranean. The food is very good and offers a variety of Tunisian dishes. The staff are courteous and polite.

We really liked our stay at the Bizerta Resort. We stayed there for 5 days for business and during our stay we had a very good service of all the staff. The rooms were clean, the food was good and the welcome warm. I recommend it to you.

Everything perfect
Very large and very beautiful structure located on the seafront equipped with all services ...
Beautiful outdoor swimming pool and a very large indoor indoor.
The restaurant was then a beautiful surprise ...
International cuisine with very well -kept and very good dishes ...
Large buffet of really fantastic fresh desserts.
The rooms are very large and equipped with all comforts and TVs even with Italian channels ...
Everything perfect
Good

First stay in this hotel, I am very disappointed with the reception woman, very cold with customers, not to smile, I ask to have a sea viewed room she refuses on the pretext that the hotel is complete when it is very empty.  During the welcome we are waiting for more than an hour to have the keys to the room, not even a glass of water to offer us. We arrive in the room there is just a bath for a single person while we are a couples with a baby. I can't find a baby bed in the bedroom, so I kindly decent at the reception to ask for the baby bed, she replies that it will come dici tonight ... And she also tells me that I can make a complaint in case I do not receive the baby bed with a poorly polished look.
At the end of the stay I make the keys not even a word or a look. Frankly, she does not deserve the place of the reception.
Very average breakfast. Dirty table. 
Clean room but too much noise at night in the corridors and a lot of street noise ...
I do not recommend this hotel, unfortunately there are not much choice in Bizerte.

Quality hotel, attentive and attentive staff.
Rim was perfect for our complaint.
Just a few improvements to be expected regarding the quality of breakfast, the offer and quality of the drinks available during the day.
Very nice sea view from the room.
I recommend

High quality hotel with a warm service and welcome.
Very clean rooms with little staff attentions. 
Quite varied interior and exterior catering. 
We highly recommend this hotel for a stay in Bizerte

Magnificent stay,
To revisit once again 
Very good service
The dishes are very delicious 
Magnificent trais rooms with sea views
The swimming pool and the beach are very clean 
Hotel Number 1 in Bizerte

We had a pleasant stay in this hotel. Very warm welcome and benevolent staff Ai Comfort of the customer.
The room had a life on swimming pool and on the sea magnificent sunset in sight.

Cleanliness and hygiene of the toilet. Bravo to staff for work.

I will surely be back with the family one day.

A very nice discovery yesterday! 

We have eaten an excellent fish couscous very well, and drunk at the Moorish coffee a delicious mint tea.
The hotel was clean and the quality service. Bravo and good luck.

After 3 years of absence, I returned to this hotel for a long weekend of rest.
Not many customers, unfortunately given the economic situation.
Clean hotel, located on the cornice for a walk.
Very pleasant sea view room.
Correct catering,
Hall bar, busy and correct prices.
Moorish coffee with a beautiful sunny terrace.
Spa and indoor swimming pool not tried.
A pleasant stay.

Quiet hotel with a magnificent view of the sea, very clean room. Breakfast was varying! On the other hand, we did not appreciate the outdoor restaurant which in addition to being quite expensive was not excellent ...

Clean and well located, a hotel that deserves more ecological equipment because it is located by the sea.
Functional rooms and discreet staff, I have a very good memory! Very good kitchen approaching local cuisine! And fresh local products!

I was on a work trip, this is the 1st liver that I am in Bizerte, my employer chose the hotel, I need a lot of calm, to work with my team. Something that was remarkably good. 
The service is very acceptable.
Welcoming and professional staff.
Finally, location a few minutes from the city center.
And magnificent sea view, a real postcard, and without retouching.
I come back to it, and I recommend it for my friends and loved ones.
Thank you and congratulations for the whole team of the Bizerta Resort hotel.

The judgment is above the average for the relationship between what is offered (dinner, breakfast and room) and the price.  The structure would need a reconditioning.
However quiet and pleasant stay. Average service.

An extra hotel, very clean room, correct prices, a warm welcome and service, refined cuisine, very well served, an ideal place to reside, also to make your meetings or congresses, I advise you to go there

I stayed three days at the hotel, for the reasons of work.
The room was very large and well furnished, with a balcony overlooking the sea.
Clean and comfortable, the only drawback, not all the power outlets worked ...
The restaurant is also quite good, and breakfast is not very varied (perhaps because we are in winter, with not too many customers).
I give the four stars because in any case the value for money is still very valid!
Clean clean hotel well located superb sea view, helpful personnel kind very welcome. It is an establishment that makes a lot of effort in order to satisfy its customers. A big thank you ....

Mediocre hotel neither more or less, no professionalism housekeeper not at all clean reception at the reception very disappointing not to smile at all! Go your way there are better hotels than this on Bizerte!

Pleasant for a business trip to meet in a hotel by the beach. 
However, the qualities of the hotel service are just passable. Room that would need a renovation, correct breakfast without more. The historic port of Bizerte a few hundred meters is to be seen.

We are very satisfied with our stay, a very warm welcome from the reception staff that I greet a lot and also all the hotel staff 
Everything is pleasant the reception, the greenery, the rooms the restaurant, the cleanliness ..... 
I highly recommend this hotel

A real 4 stars, chic and refined and above all a perfect welcome. We spent 5 days there and appreciated everything, the service, the spa, the breakfasts, the meals, the cleanliness is a dream hotel to order
We had a very good stay, the hotel is very well placed in the water, good food with generous quantities, clean room and warm welcome. We also took advantage of an offer at the SPA, it was great.

We come with the family of 10 people with children for the swimming pool, the guy from reception no smile and tell us not to go see the pool and tells us to stay at the reception and either take tickets for the swimming pool or leave your establishment !! No respect !! A shame your staff .. we don't need this kind of welcome, they take themselves for ?? Such a disastrous and dirty hotel deserves no star.

Too bad the hotel is not too maintained it would be necessary to make renovations by competent people
Lack of cleanliness even in the catering room The tablecloths are not too clean but the staff are very nice.

The room is spacious. Bed is not comfortable and the duvet was not put in a cover. It’s very basic for its price and definitely doesn’t compare to other 4 star hotels. Not recommended unless it’s location makes sense for you. The breakfast was not good. The toilet in the room was not clean. The rest of the room was clean. No kettle so you can’t make coffee or tea in the room.

Hotel in a fantastic tourist location 
Welcome to reception 
Less rich and varied buffet 
A little classic decor in the rooms
Hotel entrance (classic architecture)
Lack of animation inside the hotel
Quality price problem
Hotel fairly commonplace, for groups or for "package", quite noisy, rather cold lobby. Odor impregnated with cigarettes in the room on the carpet or the curtains! And breakfast is quite poor.

I spent two nights in this hotel since I was in the area for work. It is a good hotel with comfort, acceptable.
Very quiet, with rooms overlooking the beach. 
Common spaces visited: only the breakfast room that presents a satisfactory offer.

We have spent a very pleasant stay, with a very available and very welcoming reception staff. Weak point.
I will go back without hesitation!

We booked a triple room. When we got there, an extra bed was in place but with no sheets and only one big towel for the 3 of us. We told the reception but then had to remind them a further 2 times for anything to get done. When the sheets finally arrived, they handed them to us and left. They didn't even try to make the bed. 

In the morning, when we woke up, our bags were covered in ants. We dusted the ants off and when we told the reception, they just asked us why we didn't tell them earlier because we could have switched rooms. We told them that there were only 1-2 ants around the room the previous night (which we thought was normal for a warm country - so we didn't think to mention it)Then they suggested that it could have been our fault if we were carrying food (we weren't).

If it had been one of the above issues, it would have been alright but combined, it was a terrible experience. We asked for a refund. They offered us half the money back, on the condition that we don't write any negative reviews online! Unbelievable!

Great sunny day at the pool. We liked the warm welcome of the employees. Thank you to the animation team and especially to Myriam one of the animators for his smile. The hotel is very beautiful and we eat well.

Old style hotel which needs refurbishing not to mention the dirt. A cookie that fell under my table took three days to be cleaned. Not tourist friendly....waiters need to know how to deal with tourists and make them happy. Wifi is disaster. Will not return to this hotel.

Home -> OK
Chambers State -> Middle. They would need to be renovated, some sockets did not work, the wire of the extra lamp was defective, etc.
Cleanliness -> The establishment being a little aging it is difficult to make a real opinion on this point.
Wifi -> free but many cuts to note
The road passes nearby which makes the hotel quite noisy in the end
Breakfast: OK with a wide choice between salty and sweet
Price: very correct for one night

At first glance, the Bizerta Resort seems ok. The reception area, the grounds outside, the beach access, the nice outdoors pool and the heated indoors pool all give the illusion that it's a proper hotel. Even the rooms are spacious. But that is where the positive aspects end. The sink does not drain, the toilet does not flush, the bathroom is depressing, the food is terrible, the breakfast is basic and service is virtually absent. If you've got an ocean view room, make sure you're on the third floor otherwise you risk seeing more concrete structures than ocean from the balcony.

We were there for a conference and the meeting room was nicely located and very well heated. But it's not a place where I would choose to come for a holiday, as you spend most of your time stressing because the basics don't work.

Clean hotel and with various services, which go, from welcome to body care.
Always clean and fragrant rooms, just put the appropriate "Clean My Room" scorer and you will be satisfied, the only inconvenience and that for two days and failure to warm up and the water was not very hot, which then resolved in the best way.
The restaurant is worthy of a visit, breakfast is really excellent and for all tastes, lunch and dinner to be enjoyed in the company of beer or wine, which are normally served at the tables, with excellent dishes of local and European cuisine. The pasta is not their strong.

Opened in 1997, this hotel is still in good condition. The welcome was correct.
I visited a few rooms and a suite, whose furnishings are completely correct for a 20 -year -old hotel.
I have lunch an egg brick and an excellent fish couscous.
I drank a good Turkish coffee.
In short, I had a good time.
I go back soon.

Room with pretty sea view, large with small terrace. Aging decoration and bathrooms that border on obsolescence, in particular the level of lighting and plumbing 
No wifi in the room I occupied, no assistance from the reception which did not seem concerned 
Air conditioning automatically climbs that we leave the room, as a result when you go back in the middle of the day the atmosphere is stifling and unbearable 
Nice international TV bouquet but no list of channels available
Sad and uninteresting breakfast buffet 

The bedding is low -end and is not up to the standing of the hotel and the selling prices charged 
The entertainment around the hotel is so noisy that it is useless to think of being able to enjoy the small terrace in the evening. Even inside the room, closed windows, we are disturbed and it is impossible to sleep 

In short, I am disappointed and I do not think I return to this establishment

It is a good quality hotel well placed 
The quality of the kitchen is good 

By the level of staff is a shame 
The hotel management should make the effort to train its staff commercially and explain to them that a customer is not a security tax 
For example: server that removes your plate or even draws up the next meal table when we had not finished the meal
Or Porteur or Personnel of the arrogant or aggressive reception 

A shame!

Oh well where do i begin...first of all we book this hotel because our friend had wedding so we had to stay one night...we book sea view room and paid for it and guess what got the street view...ok we won't bother it is just one night and we were tired from traveling 4 hrs with car...then AC not working...toilet not flushing...balcony doors handle broken...ok when we go out we will stop at reception and make a complaint and give them the order for room service breakfast in bed...guy at reception just said they don't have room bcs they are fully booked even though you can still book rooms on Expedia, interesting...and he can not take paper for room service we need to hang it on room doors...ok no problem we go back to room...in the morning guess what paper is still on the doors and no breakfast in room...i work in hospitality you are far far away from that...i know the situation in Tunisia is not so good and your salary is very low but if you continue like this you won't earn even this...i always tip hotel staff because i know the business but this blew me away...terrible service and management...

It is necessary to avoid your restaurant may its mediocre buffet be the dinner served at the table not at a 4 -star hotel.
And above all you have to check the factors that you will sign to avoid unpleasant surprises.

We wanted to spend a night see 2 in this hotel, we did not even spend the door, because taken was part by the doorman, arrogant condescending, in addition to passing their functions by harassing the customers of questions. The reception is to be reviewed and the training of staff too, the amateurism of the doors is distressing.

The hotel is well located behind the beach, near the city center. It is clean and welcoming but nothing more.
The rooms would require a small renovation, because the whole date and is no longer fresh.
At night, it's a bit noisy. Breakfast does not offer a lot of choices and the products are not very good, especially coffee.

In short, for the moment, it is still going but it will not last a few more years ...
Dear food not worthy of a four star lost a lot as it was better ten years ago, it is more young young people who come from abroad in summer who are tidy for two nights her pass but without more

Very good experience, the staff are very professional and very flexible for crises in particular reception. The reception chief (Rym Ben Hasine) was of great help and has shown a lot of flexibility. The whole team is super kind and professional. The rooms are clean and well maintained, those who have seen on the swimming pool and the sea have a superb view. The hotel offers services (seminar, spa, catering ...) Hotel to advise for seminars and for family holidays.

I stayed for a long time at the hotel for work reasons. It is truly comfortable, very clean compared to the standards I have seen elsewhere. Large rooms and if with a view of the swimming pool and the sea, a real show.
Large and clean bathroom. Courteous and diligent staff. Excellent location for both walks in the city and excursions outside it.

Nice hotel, very welcome, spacious and clean.
Stay as part of business travel for one night.
I haven't eaten on site, or have breakfast.
I will go back without hesitation.

The hotel is large, breakfast is a scarce variety, a lot of typical in the area but it would be better more varied for the strangers.
The room was not bad, I played one with good views although cleaning appeared more than it was, the first day well but when it goes in 5 it does not strive the cleaning staff.

A bad detail was that with the reservation it was mandatory that we had to pay with targeta, and at the time of truth because Nanai, they played it to us and if it is not for the director Estams there yet.

No very clear if I would repeat at this hotel

Can't complain about the staff and the cleanliness of the rooms although some softener could be used for the towels..
The restaurant is of poor quality and service for such a luxury hotel beneath expectation.
Breakfast is ok but the coffee was exceptionally lousy

Beautiful hotel, with a warm welcome
Meals are good and varied 
Comfortable and well soundproofed rooms 
The most of the hotel is the swimming pool and the beach 
Really very good for business stays 
Thank you again for the welcome
I spent two nights in the resorts the service and pleasant the rooms are clean the spy and at 50mt the sea view rooms excellent hotel recommended to spend a long holiday and also for work greetings

The staff are welcoming. My room was correct except the shower head which was very damaged. 
On the food side, the fish was good but the rest commonplace and some servers have a red fish memory. 
The sea view is nice. 
The hotel still deserves a refreshment at the level of the paintings (everything flakes).

I have been to this hotel for work many times. It is a very well -kept hotel with good service. Ms. Ben Hassine at the reception speaks German well and looked after us. I am happy to come back next year!

Stay for business in LPD for a weekend at the end of the summer.

Strengths:
Spacious rooms. TV with French channels with a very good quality image. TF1, FR2, FR3, M6, France 24.
Office in the room. Long deep swimming pool (for athletes). Small bodybuilding room. Good quality of massage and care. Breakfast is friendly. Friendly staff.

Point to improve:
The carpet in the rooms deserves to be thoroughly deserves or replacement. The chamber air conditioner deserves a small gas recharge to be more effective. The parking lot is not closed by a fence and gate. Bedding and decoration deserve a makeover. (80s and 90s).

Overall the hotel is maintained and correct. The city is very friendly especially the district of Old Port.

A bit expensive but nice hotel

Breakfast is nice

Two swimming pools 
One inside and one outside 

There is a gym but you have to pay for it 

Old city is very close about 10 minutes walk

The rooms have good space
But no boiler for tea

People are very friendly at reception 

Food is great at hotel restaurant and price is acceptable

Thank you departure with lots of regret we go from 5/08 to 12/08/2016 at the top of the pleasant cleaning lady with little pink attention on the bed and reception and personal at the top and very professional loyal since 2010 C not close to changing and you deserve your 5 stars soon

have spent a wedding party on 08/13/2016 were not satisfied
- You open the door on your own 
- No warm welcome 
- Air conditioning zero 
- No safety 
- The car is too far from the main door 
here and I'm talking about a 4 star 
It is not the first in June me I attended a congress it is worse neither air conditioning nor reception even the Minister of Energy reacted to 
B night

Positive spitality: very clean room, but especially every evening when I return there are flowers, images with wonderful towels !!!
Restore and breakfast: positive
Presence of Alcol
Very sincere reception.
Fortunately in Bizerte there is this hotel !!

Excellent hotel, impeccable service, helpful and welcoming staff 
Spacious room and beautiful view
Spacious seminar
Many thanks for the hotel staff (banker, reception, maintenance, .....)

We stayed there for two nights. The place looks overall ok, like a true resort. We payed 110 euros per night (55 euros per person, not sure why they count per person...). Quite a sum for Tunisia and from there one is tempted to judge everything based on rather high standards. And that s when one gets often disappointed, though not always. The room was nice with sea view and lots of light. Hotel itself looks old, like it hasn't been maintained since the 80s. One can feel that these are hard times for tourism and that money is scarce. Hotel seems understaffed. Staff are very nice, though better service would be expected for this kind of hotel. Alcohol is served and the bar looks old and empty and atmosphere rather sad. Two swimming pools - outdoor and indoor - though outdoor was not open yet. Outside the badly needs maintenance.  Breakfast was included but was simply of  horrible quality. Internet worked bad.  So overall OK but not worth the price really.

+ Accessibility and proximity to the city center as well as the cornice (very lively area)
+ Proximity of all types of shops
+ Friendship of the person upon reception
+ Well -maintained garden and lawn 
+ Gigantic apartment for 2 or even 3 people

- Cleanliness of the room and especially sanitary facilities
- General State of accessories and utensils made available
- Too much noise early in the morning when he passed away maids

I don't understand in which hotel the other travelers were to make such terrible reviews. I agree that the resort denomination is inappropriate, but for the rest it is definitely a good hotel for at least a working stay. I finally found European standards with excellent cleaning in the rooms and a discreet restaurant also on paper.
 Wi-Fi worked perfectly everywhere.
To this is added an excellent service to the reception. 
Judgment, therefore, very positive.

Beautiful swimming pool but no slide for children

The hotel is kept by arms in arms.

The parking lot is accessible.

The a little dirty beach (no garbage cans on the beach!)

The food is average

First I don't know how they did to call him resort, since he really has nothing. We stayed in this bad hotel in mid -August we booked for three days, but on the first day we ran away. They are not organized at all. In the middle of August on the bed there were wool blankets, the room was dirty. They were endowed with a spa, but it was practically in the most absolute degradation, we went to have dinner in the restaurant and there was a gentleman who did both waitresses and chefs, food (if we want to call him such) seemed a pulp or food for animals. The beach was closed, or rather it was without sunbeds and there were only a few umbrellas, the path to get there was full of personal mud puddles at all suitable for a resort. It was a very bad experience. The only positive thing was Wi-Fi in the rooms.

If the staff were very available and helpful, we still had to claim a change of bedding because our covers and the pillows because there were traces of dirt and hairs! If wifi and satellite television worked very well in the rooms, however, the jacuzzi and the indoor pool were abandoned. The staff of the restaurant in the evening sometimes forgot that we were in a 4 star and that we were entitled to have a minium of respect in attitude.

Near the hotel, a huge sewer pipe flows into the sea. 
Swimming is therefore put in the pool ...
No luck, you will enjoy joys of the filthy smell whatever the place of the swimming pool where you are installed ...
Explanations from reception: "It's outside the hotel ..."

Maybe, but it is indeed inside the hotel that the air is unbreathable ....
Scheduled for 4 nights, we left the hotel the day after our arrival.

Maybe better 
No Didier space at the hotel on the beach 
No animation on the pool 
But it represents one of the best hotels in Bizerte 
Good location Good quality of service at restaurant levels 
Understandable manager

The hotel is not bad, large swimming pool, deck chairs, beach at 50m. Negative points: the carpet in the room is old and stained with everything, the buffet kitchen is ok, in La Carta no. Breakfast ok the women who clean the room are attentive to cleaning for what it is in their means .. overall 3 out of 5 stars is my vote

Hotel very pleasant face to the sea (I had asked for a room with sea view), efficient and professional staff, nothing to say, a big thank you to cleaning women in my room (3 rd) who every day presented a different, really nice decoration.
The meals were good, the bartender very nice and attentive, there were few people the week of my presence, what a pity the pools were not yet in service .....

The location of the hotel is excellent, moreover it is the first to find on your way when arriving in the city.
Very close to the medina of Bizerte and the old port but especially by the sea.
The rooms which overlook the sea and the large swimming pool have a very beautiful view, the others which give on the buildings offer nothing special in terms of view and their large terraces are used only to sunbathe since they welcome a lot of sun. And even if these rooms overlook the street they are not noisy it is well isolated.
The indoor swimming pool is often full because they are accessible even to non -residents.
The restaurant is average and the food is not famous in terms of taste and variety.
The cushions, covers and carpets are not very clean. You can find traces on the cushions or crumbs on the carpets when we have just cleaned the room. 
WCs and bathrooms in the rooms or elsewhere in the hotel are always clean and well maintained. Likewise for everything that is a bath towel.

I also stayed for work in March 2015, and it was not the first time, as usual I found a good 4 -star "Tunisian" 4 stars, so with a fair level of cleaning and excellent hospitality, being on the work of work I appreciated the free and excellent wifi, the large room and the good breakfast for my wife, who eats sweet, acceptable for me that I eat salty, being in a Muslim country, the pork is missing (dried ham). Excellent location and parking. In summer I think it can also be an alternative also valid for holidays, given that it has a swimming pool, Piccola spa and it is on the beach, even if bizerts, it is not properly what an European would call "tourist city", but as my wife says, excellent for knowing Tunisia "in side".

Very well placed hotel, facing the sea. If you don't have a sea side room it is very noisy, a lot of traffic. The rooms are clean, the bedding in good condition, but there are always a few things that do not work, we are in Tunisia.
If we compare with European standard, it's more a 2 - 3 stars than a 4 star. 
It is still one of the best in Bizerte.

Hotels a few steps from the sea and the center of Bizerta .. well -kept structure with bars, swimming pool, gym and small spa .. there are also the restaurant ... friendly and helpful and helpful and clean. Mine was a stay for work but I believe the stay is pleasant even in summer periods.

Stayed at this hotel because the lonely planet described it as a 'lap of luxury' with pools, jacuzzi and sauna. 
We arrived and paid 10x the amount than our last hotel and was told that the outdoor pool was out of use and the jacuzzi was broken. 
If we'd have known this we would never have stayed here. It is not a 'lap of luxury' at all, rooms are dated and not as clean as you'd expect a 4 star hotel to be. Avoid this hotel, it's a waste of money.

Something is still missing! The staff are smiling but is certainly exploited because if we know them well and if we put the form on the service then in quality!
That said, they can do nothing against the dilapidation of the installations and the false ads of the great director that I himself saw Houspill the cleaning women so that everything shines for the arrival of journalists that he had to roll in the flour ...
But the view is offered by nature
For the detritus it is as for all of Tunisia today in prey to disorganization and to let go of public services

The hotel location is nice and the view from the sea view rooms is really great in morning's.
The breakfast is extremely basic.
The pool is nice, clean and big enough.
The beach in front is so-so... not very clean as the touristic ones.
The service is "no care"... any service interactions are wrong...you ask a bottle of water, they bring it without glasses and you wait for 30min. till you go and take it by yourself then a mid-management employee will tell you "not allowed to take glass out of the restaurant"... the receptionist are not informing about anything, like no key for the safe box... no body to open the gate at 7:30 to access the beach etc etc...
then, every one smokes everywhere and that's very smelly... why the law is not enforced? 

Big lack of cleaning a bit of everywhere... everywhere you look, there are things left behind, broken, nothing is made tidy and to the details... 

many things (such like toilet flushes, balcony lamp,...) miss maintenances, like this hotel is not maintained at all and slowly collapsing...
Anyhow, Bizerte is far from touristic path, therefore, you have to low your expectations not to be deceived like I was...

Hotel dirty, Loiiiin staff to be professional, especially an employee in the name of "gebsi" or "gafsi" which is rude and bad.
The food is also mediocre, empty hotel, dirty swimming pool, air conditioner does not work

I have been there for work.  It cannot be said that it is a tourist or fascinating place.  The hotel has a beautiful structure with the side on the sea very beautiful.  The rooms are quite clean even if you leave a little degraded.  Kind staff.  Non -existent wifi. ..Solo at the reception.  If you really have to stay in those parts I would say recommended .... also given the rest.

I just spent two days in Bizerta Resort during the month of July 2014. The hotel is very well located, easy to access, has a parking lot and it has direct access to a very clean and not very busy beach. Despite the cancellation of the last minute of one of the reserved rooms, I was not paid for anything also like I had a very small baby with me, I was given access to the room two hours before check in. Always with a smile in addition.
The good impression I had when I arrived lasted the whole stay or maid, carrier, server at the restaurant or the snake bar, all were of impeccable professionalism and very kindness and flexibility. This professionalism and kindness make you forget some brands of old age that the hotel is starting to take which is starting to need a little new stroke.
Dinner and breakfast food is diversified and good (especially pastry) however not quite worthy of a five -star but rather four stars. However, everyone always ends up finding a dish for their taste.

 The sea in front of the hotel is magnificent but it is a public beach not too busy. The view from the room is just magnificent.
Finally a very good value for money.
I will gladly come back

Very good hotel well located, I went there 5 years ago I was even allowed to go to Jacouzzi when I was not yet the age! Very nice swimming pool, well maintained. My room was with sea view and it was well lit. There is even a nearby hair salon! The staff were pleasant. I plan to go back this summer!

During my regular passage throughout the year,
The hotel remains suitable but surely not comparable to the French standard.
Otherwise welcome, the rooms would need a good refreshment ...
The staff are present and at your service. The restaurant of the average hotel.
For a business sehour it is correct but for a vacation favoring the guest rooms 
more realistic of tradition ...

I found myself for work at the bizerta, very nice, very impactful, the rooms are clean and well equipped, the staff is courteous and helpful, also there is an excellent restaurant.
There is talk of French French and also a little Italian, the price is decidedly aligned '' at the bottom '' to the rest of the Alaberghi in this category.
Excellent place, near the highway, beautiful addytual swimming pools with hot water.
NMPLE VALID.

I was in Tunisia for work at the Bizerta Resort. I found myself well, the staff is friendly and very nice. The rooms are clean and ordered. WiFi works well (although every day you have to ask for new credentials at the reception for changing them)

I spent 4 nights in Bizerta Resort. 
It was noisy, I had a very bad experience in the restaurant, ordering a Couscous Royal smelling fish and being sick all night !
The service is nice but not efficient, if you have any problem like Internet ... you just have to wait...nobody to assist you.
The Spa is really old and dirty ... this place could be much better !
The location is very nice and the view in the morning is good!

I was professionally in the bicert resort in Nov/Dec 13.
Room was okay, only the carpet would have to be replaced, it has had a few years on his belt.
Internet was free but very cumbersome to register, you get an access to pin,
that doesn't always work.
Breakfast was fine and sufficient, if you want sausage for breakfast, you are out of place in such countries that there is nothing that corresponds to German quality and taste.

I have stayed several times for work reasons; To be a 4 star, it seems a little exaggerated to me; It is very little of resorts, it is more a hotel useful for work reasons than holiday; Discreet cleaning, the services are scarce, discreet breakfast (not really rich), the restaurant menu is sufficient; Considering the geographical place, perhaps everything is acceptable; The daily price of the stay and the restaurant, however, is excessive for the Tunisian stds, but there is very little better there.

Tested during a business trip at the beginning of December the "resort" is confirmed as a good hotel to spend the nights between one day of work and another. Personally I would not spend the holidays here but surely in the hotels of Bizerta's hotel it is a few more ups and on top.
Pleasant rooms, adequate heating (not a warranty in Tunisia) and a large bathroom with hot and strong shower.
Too bad the promised free Wi-Fi with very low field and which often does not work from 20:00 on the next morning. Given the costs of calls from Tunisia to Italy (€ 3.00 minutes with Vodafone) is a heavy lack.
Simple but good international breakfast, coffee to avoid, better The or Nescafè. 
At check out they do not recognize travel vouchers by saying that the credit cards provided by the travel agencies are not valid. A classic. With some bickering and alche phone calls to the agency it is resolved. What a beard though!

I would call it more a large hotel on the sea than a resort. A little 70s style. However practical for those who are passing through and for one night only. The rooms are functional, and ours had sea view. Kind staff. Good breakfast. A little out of price. It is difficult for me to understand who can stay here to spend his holidays.
Small bedroom for a four star Dirty bathroom curtain dirty bath carpet small tele which was not working balcon

i was there for five days with my wife and three teenage kids for vacation. the location is good, walking distance to old city, the pool and beach beatiful, and staff really friendly. minor issues that should be improved given the price: wifi too weak, no drinking water for breakfast, no beach chairs at the otherwise nice beach - thats all. it was during ramadan and we were nearly the only tourists, there were some businessmen. i can recommend to stay there, the city is interesting.

I only spent one night in this hotel for a business trip to Tunisia in the middle of December so outside the very touristy period. The hotel that wants to be Palace is undoubtedly on a more glorious past, but remains very well maintained. Obviously European standards are not there, but it is a very well kept and maintained establishment. 

The rooms are spacious with good quality wifi access. The room I had given on the sea, a treat when I wake up with sunrise and during the night when I was rocked by the sound of the waves. The view is a little less delightful with beyond the limit of the hotel a view that looks more like a vacant lot ...  

I have not tested the my host restaurant for this stay preferring to take me to a nearby fish restaurant. I did not test breakfast either.

Good hotel and good level related to its category. Offers several quick washing services of clothes. Exterior and covered pool. Very good for the family. serious staff of the smiling and welcoming. Women a little less at the reception. But it's okay!. It is very well located to allow you to visit the center of Bizerte.

Although we did not stay here (we had drinks in the bar), we appreciated the ability to use the wifi which was fast and efficient.  Staff were very friendly to us when we asked if we could use the WiFi as we could not find WiFi and were struggling with the Arabic keyboards in the Internet Cafes.

Thank You!

The room was great, we booked a suite, and the maid did a great job, even though the toilet didn't flush properly. We had a nice sea view. The indoor pool was nice. The outside pool looked nice but was deserted. The gate to the beach was locked. Breakfast was nice though lacking in variety.

We booked with booking.com and the hotel refused to honour the price we booked at. The lady cashier argued for 20 minutes, at check out, before giving up and was bad tempered throughout. She was good at arguing in English though.

Internet connection was difficult. They say they change the pass codes daily but on the first day it only worked for about 1/2 hour and on our 2nd day we had to get 3 codes from reception before we got one that worked.

We went out to eat dinner in town south of the kasbah. We had good cheap meals and found the locals to be helpful and very friendly even while their countrymen were demonstrating at the US embassy in Tunis.

Arriving in Bizerta we struggled not a little to find accommodation confatting to us, in the end we opted for this structure.
Structure that over time has been left a little at the mercy of itself,
 large rooms but:
In our air conditioning system, it did not work for the two days of the stay, even after our complaints and an approximate look by the hotel technician.
Our window door did not close, tiles in the broken bathroom, broken paper-igienic-igienic hornbag (certainly not fundamental details, but when you stay in a four star, it is normal for you to notice ....).
Our room was seen covered swimming pool, in the sense that the balcony was in front of the pool cover !!!
Positive: the kindness of the operators both at the reception and at the bar or restaurant.
A quality breakfast even if with a limited choice.
The sea in front of the hotel when we went, late August was not the best, full of algae.
Quality/price ratio a little expensive.

.

My parents stayed in this hotel for two weeks. They found themselves very well. The rooms are large and comfortable, the best those sea views and far from the noise of traffic. The restaurant is great. You eat very well and in abundance. All the staff is very discreet and always present. There is also a restaurant that makes pizzas with a wood oven if you want to savor flavors known to us. The outdoor swimming pool is very beautiful, the wellness center as well. The beach is not very cared for, too bad. The clear sea peò with some seaweed.

Very good hotel above Tunisian standards.

Clean - Large very clean room.

Ideally located in the heart of Bizerte near the old port.

Even the restaurant of the swimming pool provided with very good food quite varied.

A very large swimming pool, which too bad is very quickly very deep ... to flane it's not top top.

Little smiling but efficient staff.

Good stay

The hotel is not bad, it's quiet we sleep well there and it's a good starting point to wander in the region. I had stayed there two or three years ago and we liked it.
Except that this time an unexpected phenomenon "was waiting for us": the director ... with a little dubious mental health ... He gave me a lesson on the check in the hotels because I wanted to have the room at 1 p.m. telling myself that it was not possible at 3 p.m. and that 1 was his law that applied and that he knew everything better than I had white hair (the check in the website Reservation) ... We took 2 bedrooms and a suite, but we could not raise any visitor in the suite !!! And then he wanted to get everyone out of the swimming pool at 6 p.m. In short, a very amazing behavior, he takes himself for a general supervisor except that for my part I will not take any more at this hotel as long as he is there ...

Traveling several times a year in Tunisia for two years, I have just discovered a superb hotel in Bizerte, the Bizerta Resort, proudly displaying its 4 stars but which deserves to have a 5th very quickly. You are very kindly welcomed at the reception by a smiling staff and very efficient. The rooms are very spacious, nicely decorated, tastefully, and very well equipped, including with the WiFi throughout the hotel including the rooms. For those who like to watch television, the hotel offers a large amount of Arab, international and French channels like France 2, TF1, M6 etc.
The women of rooms are also very friendly and provide a very cleaning service, always with a smile. The bathroom benefits from all modern equipment and in perfect condition.
Well air conditioned, the room also has a very suitable balcony of dimension.
Overall, the staff are not stingy with information and puts themselves at your entire disposal to satisfy you.
For having tested it for several days, the buffet breakfast offers a significant choice of breads, pastries and cakes; Three kinds of cheeses are offered next to hot dishes including eggs and Tunisian specialties. Good choice of yogurts also and fresh seasonal fruit.
This hotel is an excellent price ratio price. I can easily testify, I who travel around the world as a journalist. Advertising announces it as a business hotel. Admittedly, but it can also be very suitable for a pleasant family vacation. The swimming pool is of beautiful dimension and the lifeguard very kind. You can eat in summer at the snack near the swimming pool for those who love idleness all day.
A spa is also announced, I did not have the leisure to test it but it seems completely suitable.
Another significant point, the hotel is well located in Bizerte, equidistence of the port, the city center and the cornice.
If you want to discover Bizerte, her nice little restaurants, her fish, her terraces, a good address where to stay, without hesitation: the Bizerta Resort! You will not be disappointed! You have my word!

i've spent a wonderfull holiday with my family . We spent unforgottable moments . Great location The staff was warm &  welcoming staff, well organized housekeeping staff , very clean rooms smell fresh. we enjoyed swimming in the covered swimming pool. The kids enjoyed so much. I think it's very quiet & relaxing place where we can spend nice holiday with the family.

The staff at the reception was excellent. Really nice, a very kind stages of the floors. A cleanliness of the rooms and premises worthy of a 5*.  I would like to come back without hesitation. A very nice view of the sea and relaxation and relaxation in the well -equipped and furnished spa center. Very varied lunch. A hotel by the sea and very close to the city center.
No more animation would be desirable.

I stayed here way back in November of 2001.  (It says December 2010 but it wouldn't let me go back any farther.) It was my first business trip and I was 19.  I enjoyed the stay fully.  Since it was in November, I wasn't able to use the pool.  The view from my room was over looking the Mediterranean.  This was a very pleasant stay for my first overseas business trip.

A terrible hotel, old and unhealthy, the service is poor the staff and unpleasant and only seeks to scratch the tips. The swimming pool is poorly maintained the jacuzzi and the sauna are old and looks like toilets. For those who want to throw their money and do it wrong is not bad .....

It is a business hotel, many customers are foreigners who work in and around the city. The rooms are large and very clean. The bathroom and the toilet in perfect condition. Take a room with a view of the sea (less noisy than in the city).
Very correct breakfast. Evening meals are varied and the staff. The downside: in summer the swimming pool is invaded by non-residents, and in the evening there are sometimes very noisy receptions. I stayed there for 2 months.
Aside from the location, be it reception, service or rapid quality / price, everything is to be reviewed ...

Here is a hotel that will welcome your wallet before you. The staff, if it seems to be at first enthusiastic, will quickly show you that smiles are intended only for your tickets. A shrew, seeing in addition that I was not married to my French companion of Tunisian origin offered to reserve two bedrooms. Pretending that this situation will be repeated everywhere else.
Of course this was completely false, but what would we not do to scratch a little more, especially since the room is 70 euros .... Did you say scam? 
Traveler friend, there is only one thing to do: Bizerte crossing and lodge with a small foam, five minutes on the ledge, cheaper, much better quality despite two less stars !!! This is the point of fall in all connoisseurs!

I've been to this hotel 3 times now while I was on business. If you are lucky and get a room for the sea side so it is a very nice stay. The hotel is located right by the sea and a wonderful view of the Mediterranean. However, if you have a room to the street, the noise starts early in the morning and sleeping is over. The restaurant is average, but the waiter are very friendly.
Free internet is available in the lobby and in the bar. The hotel is mainly used by business people, I myself would never spend a private vacation there.

The Bizerta Resort hotel is a nice hotel complex, less than 600 meters from the city center; The rooms are clean, the service in general is satisfactory; The hotel being by the beach, at night, only the noise of waves and seagulls can disturb your sleep; The bedding is quite comfortable; The parking lot is free hand your vehicle is not in a closed park. Regarding breakfasts, I will call them corrects but without being the best of my life; Overall, this hotel is perfect for staying a few days on Bizerte but a little exorbitant to stay for several weeks; Indeed, for two bedrooms (a single and a double for one night): 260 DT or around 130 euros a little expensive for this hotel.

It was said that it is the best hotel in the town and I already believe it. Good customer service, clean and quite wide rooms. Located on the beach and there are very fences restaurants and stores. 

There is wifi in the reception room and sometimes you can seek a modem from the reception office to get the Internet in the room.

Above all, good hotel for the price.

Bizerta Resort Hotel, luxury product in Tunisia, on the edge of a wide golden sandy beach ... In summer, a lively seaside hotel offering various entertainment such as "Cabaret Show, Bingo, Billards" ... without forgetting the theme evenings "folk evening, varieties' shows. This is as described in its brochure, this most "prestigious" hotel in the region. By "L'Obor Lécés" we offered ourselves a few weeks in this dream "Eldorado". But, like the crow, we let ourselves be taken by the fox. The wide golden sandy beach is only a huge bin in reality in which blooms, pells mix, plastic bags, used layers, empty cans and ... all kinds of nor fine nor gold. The seaside animation is ensured, during the day by the intrusion, at the swimming pool, every afternoon of young people emanating from the cities of the Parisian suburbs which, for subsidies are authorized to use the services of the swimming pool and the adjoining snack bar, with the sale of alcohol, making the place infrequent for the residents of the hotel. If this same place is not "public" in the morning, it is, however, difficult to find a deckchair whose mattress is not dirty or sticky, the result of their battles with cola coca or other beverages. The hotel thus proves its disinterest in the well -being of its residents and its interest in the windfall brought by this external population. As for night animations, we did not have enough to look for. Maybe it is, this unfortunate musician installed, away, by a deserted swimming pool and who drives ... nothing? Point of "bingo, variety show". On the other hand, the hotel still in search of income, welcomes almost daily weddings which, around 10 p.m. you "delight" from their "you you" to the sound of drums. Which, if you are lucky, will let you fall asleep around 1 a.m. But maybe a part of billiards would make you happy? Well no! Failed! Both are broken. Damage. Failed evening. Because the city like the hotel has nothing to offer in the evening. Are we going to be able to console ourselves in front of a good table? Again ... disappointment. At breakfast, in the form of a buffet, you will find fruit juices cut off from water, hard bread, hard eggs and some local cold meats. It is not he who will make you fat. So let's go to lunch at the snack swimming pool where a reviewed staff "welcomes" you. The smile is reserved for local customers. If you plan to have lunch there for several consecutive days it is advisable to have a pronounced taste for pizzas and pasta ... Pizzas always very fine sometimes covered with Tunisian Mozzarela Rance. Fortunately there is dinner ... There it is variable, rather less bad certain evenings. Here again it is the buffet formula that wins. At the meal level in general, the specialty of the place is to try to "turn" you what you have not chosen. You said Vanilla-Chocolate ice cream ... Well you will eat a vanilla-spout. You ask for a "gray from Tunisia" rosé, it is a "Saint Augustine" with a double price that we bring you. And everything is amendment. In summary: you have money to waste, a furious desire to get bored, this "prestigious" hotel will welcome you for an unforgettable vacation. We will not talk about the coldness of the director who does not encourage comments. Rest assured, there are quality hotels in Tunisia. But not the Bizerta Resort, at least, in terms of tourism.

Chosen the day before departure.
Excellent welcome - polite and efficient staff - Ambia R room with large wardrobes for the joy of his wife - conditionedly silent and well -adjustable system (among the best found) - location near the center and on the beach - excellent and well -kept swimming pool - good service by the pool.
The only drawback not attributable to the hotel is the beautiful and inviting but very embarrassing beach for women in bikini: Burkini reigns sovereign
Excellent hotel also for business and meetings

I have stayed here several times on business. Considering the  (£) price you will not get much better. The location is good and the rooms are spacious. Food is ok and staff are ok. The pool is great but other facilities are limited. Good value for money.
Stay in mid June: an old -fashioned establishment between nightclub and hotel.  Unbearable music until 2:00 a.m.
Beautiful hotel with really attentive staff and delicious cuisine.
You have to book in advance

Beautiful comfortable room with a bit dilapidated
Lovable helpful staff
The restaurant has a simple but good buffet

Inappropriate hotel .... breakfast and morning dinner are not up to it .... in addition customer service is very poor ...... given the price of the hotel ..... Please stay away. Please don't be deceived as we have been.

Flawless !!!
Very warm welcome and top services (caring).
The icing on the cake = top kitchen
The pool is well heated
I recommend 100 %
Good trip 😃
Very excellent hotel, high services and very special reception

To flee
I strongly advise against.

During my stay I parked my vehicle in the hotel grounds in the private car park and I found it damaged.

Despite the various complaints made at the hotel and the various stimulates made to the managers, no solution was offered to repair the damage that was caused to me or find the exact person who damaged my vehicle and this despite the video surveillance system.

3 months after the incident no return from them.

So I decided to file a complaint in order to settle my business.

My car is well guaranteed but my deductible is 600 euros for this type of accident.

I strongly advise against this hotel in view of the manner of my problem has been managed.
Clean swimming pool and beautiful sea view
Pleasant 💯

I had a pleasant stay. There were not too many people. It was very calm.
I liked the hotel restaurant less

"To flee absolutely! Hotel very dirty, we feel the dust everywhere. We paid for a room with sea view, the receptionist assured us that he had given us one of the best rooms. Arriving, surprised: the door of the room was wide open and the furniture was overturned, as we can see in the photos. We came back down to report this to the receptionist, which replied that the hotel was complete, although all the rooms were complete, although all room Open and empty.

For asmathics like me, I do not recommend this hotel. It has the distinction of having carpets in the rooms and what is more systematically cleaned. Especially since the hotel does not have non -smoking rooms (all rooms have an ashtray) ... so may have cigarette odors in some of them. In addition, the service is not worthy of a 4*: glasses offered but no water bottle which is the minimum required. To succeed in sleeping, I had to put a t-shirt on the pillow so much that he was loaded with dust. I do not recommend this hotel for the dilapidation of the rooms. Otherwise the staff try to do the necessary with the few means made available. Expensive for what it is (110 €/night in September.
Excellent
The team is very welcoming, the large and clean swimming pool, calm, cleanliness, ... I recommend

Hotel room and nice reception like receptionists
On the other hand, the restaurant staff are greedy and indecent. We had lunch and when I left my 81 -year -old mother only the staff asked her to pay the swimming pool while she was in the restaurant part. On the one hand nothing mentions that the restaurant customers must pay the swimming pool. On the other hand if we wanted to swim we would have come with our swimsuits 🤣

Frankly we came with the family to this hotel and frankly pleasantly surprised the first week in a hotel has a disaster in the second week in this Super Bizerta hotel comes out !!!; , clean room thank you to the housekeeper of the 4th super nothing to say the pti dej super good nikel swimming pool frankly I will come back it's on !!!! And thank you at the reception the staff at the top nice super nothing to say to Mr nidal you are at the top you were very nice thank you I will come back I say to you soon but this hotel I recommend to fon 🙏😘😘😘😘

Great place and fantastic workers! Really felt at home here. I want to mention Reem at the front desk who was very professional and assisted us with all our needs. My family and I enjoyed our vacation here in the beautiful city of Bin Zirte
Excellent services and nice staff. The Lady named Reem that works here is very nice and helpful.
I strongly advise against changing breakfasts of a 2 star hotel not of a 4 star and also wall room and carpet also even the bed frame is sincerely c not a hotel for 4 stars

I only judge the pool part. I find the price of the reasonable entry around 40TD. The pool is large, well maintained. The decor is relaxing with access to the direct beach. A good day relaxation.
Regarding the snack part I find that the prices are high and the quality of food is not there. Bad value for money.
The cleanliness of the toilets is also to be reviewed, there are many large cockroaches which is not pleasant. I know it is a city with a lot of cockroaches but for a 4* hotel you have the means to neutralize them.
I recommend 100%

I think it was the best possible experience we could have here, moving to Bizerte, we have booked at the hotel in the meantime, the hotel members have always been there to make time spent pleasant, very available to customers and kind, whether to find out about the city, the details of the hotel and the reservation. Really the service is really impeccable and varied, and people working there pleasant.

Bizerta Resort Congress & Spa hotel: a haven of peace by the sea

Ideal location: located on the cornice of Sidi Salem in Bizerte, the Bizerta Resort Congress & Spa Hotel offers direct access to a sandy beach and is near the city center and tourist sites. Impeccable service: Hotel staff are attentive and polyglot, offering superior quality service for an unforgettable stay.

Excellent value for money: the Bizerta Resort Congress & Spa Hotel offers excellent value for money, ideal for families, couples and business travelers.
